question: Agriculture and Farmers Welfare Ministry will celebrate Sankalp to Siddhi - New India Manthan from __________.
explanation: Agriculture and Farmers Welfare Ministry will celebrate Sankalp to Siddhi - New India Manthan in all the districts of the country from 19th to 30th of this month. Shri Radha Mohan Singh informed that New India Manthan program to be organized in all Districts of the Country.
